## NS.httpworm() method

Runs the HTTPWorm.exe program on the target server. HTTPWorm.exe must exist on your home computer.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
httpworm(host: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  host | string | Hostname of the target server. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void

## Remarks

RAM cost: 0.05 GB

## Example


```ts
httpworm("foodnstuff");
```
